Neat-o Stuff in Worcester

  • Downhill Battle - geeky music activism
  • Fujichia - indie something or other
  • Higgin's Armory Museum - I haven't been yet, but its #1 on my list
  • Quan Yin - vegetarian Asian a la Grasshopper
  • Da Lat - good, cheap Vietnamese plus boba tea
  • Tortilla Sams - clearly no Anna's or El Burrito, but still tasty
